text: goal bicischools provide functions supporting development ‘bike bus’ routes. Work progress…

title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: can install development version bicischools GitHub : special using README.Rmd instead just README.md? can include R chunks like : ’ll still need render README.Rmd regularly, keep README.md --date. devtools::build_readme() handy . can also embed plots, example: case, don’t forget commit push resulting figure files, display GitHub CRAN.
code: # install.packages("pak") pak::pak("bicischools/bicischools") # Create readme: usethis::use_readme_rmd() # get deps getwd() pkg_deps = renv::dependencies("code/case-study-school.R") names(pkg_deps) pkg_deps = as.data.frame(pkg_deps) pkg_deps$Package lapply(pkg_deps$Package, usethis::use_package) # See if checks are happy now: devtools::check() usethis::use_mit_license() usethis::use_github_action("check-standard") summary(cars) #>      speed           dist        #>  Min.   : 4.0   Min.   :  2.00   #>  1st Qu.:12.0   1st Qu.: 26.00   #>  Median :15.0   Median : 36.00   #>  Mean   :15.4   Mean   : 42.98   #>  3rd Qu.:19.0   3rd Qu.: 56.00   #>  Max.   :25.0   Max.   :120.00

title: Title — sim_schools
Title — sim_schools
code: sim_schools(   origins,   destinations,   model,   ...,   balancing = c("origins", "destinations", "both"),   max_dist = Inf,   origins.id = names(origins)[1],   origins.size = names(origins)[2],   destinations.id = names(destinations)[1],   destinations.size = names(destinations)[2],   keep_cols = FALSE,   output_col = "modelled_trips",   max_iter = 25 )

title: Title — sim_schools
text: origins sf object representing origins. destinations sf object representing destinations. model character string specifying model use. ... Additional arguments passed model function. balancing character string specifying balancing method. One "origins", "destinations", "". max_dist numeric value specifying maximum distance interaction. origins.id character string specifying ID column origins sf object. origins.size character string specifying size column origins sf object. destinations.id character string specifying ID column destinations sf object. destinations.size character string specifying size column destinations sf object. keep_cols logical value. TRUE, columns input data kept. FALSE (default), O, D output_col kept. output_col character string specifying name column modelled trips (default "modelled_trips"). max_iter integer, maximum number iterations balancing algorithm (default 25).
